page.title: 09A STOVER SCHOOL BOARDER.
page.content: At 7.20 the first bell goes and the girls get up at 7.30.Breakfast is at 8.00 followed by dormitory tidying and bedmaking which is inspected.At 8.45 they go down to school,with registration at 9.00.Assembly finishes at 9.20 followed by morning lessons until 12.10 when they have lunch.Lunch finishes at 1.20 and lessons restart until 4.00 when they change out of their uniforms.Everyone has a hot drink and a biscuit and the tuck shop opens.From 4.15 until 4.45 they do activities and each girl must do two per week,if she is a boarder.School clubs include,computer,cookery,pottery ,art,swimming,library and riding. Dinner is at 5.45 and from 7.00 until 8.00 they do their homework,usually 3 subjects.They prepare for bed at 8.30 and from 9.00 they have 15 minutes to talk and then the lights go out.
